org.jplot2d.axtick

Interface RangeAdvisor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLinearTickCalculator, ArcDmsTickCalculator, DateTickCalculator, LinearTickCalculator, TAIMicrosTickCalculator, TimeHmsTickCalculator

    public interface RangeAdvisor
    Calculate a proper range to arrange major ticks falling on the edge.
